TextEng: I've talked to you long enough.
How about I help you kobolds fight your way out of here?
Of course. Let's do it now!
Maybe... for the right price.
No, forget I mentioned that.
<StartCheck>[Perform]</Start> <StartAction>[Attempt to fascinate the Kobolds]</Start>
<StartAction>[Cast Bane on the Kobold]</Start> Just surrender now and you won't get hurt!
Text: <StartAction>[코볼트에게 재앙을 시전한다]</Start> 지금 항복하면 안 다쳐!

TextEng: <StartAction>[Cast Scare on the Kobold]</Start> Just surrender now and you won't get hurt!
Text: <StartAction>[코볼트에게 공포를 시전한다]</Start> 지금 항복하면 안 다쳐!

TextEng: <StartAction>[Cast Sleep on the Kobolds]</Start>
<StartAction>[Cast Charm Person on the Kobold]</Start> Just put your weapons away and give yourselves up. You can trust me.
Text: <StartAction>[코볼트에게 사람 현혹을 시전한다]</Start> 무기 내려놓고 항복해. 날 믿어도 돼.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I tell you what... surrender now and I'll let you all live.
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 이렇게 하자... 지금 항복하면 다 살려줄게.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> All right, you win. We'll let you go.
I suppose you're right...
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> You'll do as I say! Now let them go!
<StartAction>[Whisper]</Start> We will ambush them when they come out!
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Don't worry about it. I will rescue her later, if I can.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 신경 쓰지 마. 나중에 구할 수 있으면 구할게.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Take me as a hostage, instead, and let the woman go.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 대신 날 인질로 잡고, 여자는 보내줘.

TextEng: Forget it! I'm not going in there by myself.
Text: 싫어! 혼자 그 안에 안 들어가.

TextEng: I agree. I will come alone.
Forget it. I won't do that.
Very well. No creatures. <StartAction>[Dismiss any familiars, animal companions or summoned creatures.]</Start>
Text: 알았어. 생명체 없이. <StartAction>[사역마, 동물 동료, 소환된 생명체를 해제한다.]</Start>

TextEng: Now that the cook is safe I can kill you properly!
Text: 요리사가 안전하니 이제 제대로 죽여버릴 수 있어!

TextEng: Now that I'm on this side... how about I help you get out of here?
Text: 이제 이쪽에 왔으니... 여기서 탈출하도록 도와줄까?

TextEng: No. Forget I said anything.
Here! Eat hot death, kobold!!
Maybe. If the price is right.
Absolutely. Let's attack them now!
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> Absolutely. Let's attack them now!
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I'm much stronger than the cook. Surrender now and you won't get hurt.
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 나 요리사보다 훨씬 강해. 지금 항복하면 안 다쳐.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Look... you can leave now. Just go and nobody will hurt you.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 들어봐... 이제 가도 돼. 그냥 가면 아무도 안 다치게 해줄게.

TextEng: A reward? Sounds good to me.
Just get out of here, vermin. I don't want your reward.
Text: 그냥 꺼져, 해충들아. 너희 보상 따윈 필요 없어.

TextEng: Actually, I just like to kill. And you're next!
Text: 사실, 난 그냥 죽이는 걸 좋아해. 다음은 너야!
